email.subject: Incomplete Mod
email.body:
So uh, as you may know, this mod is unfinished.
Currently, the only mission available at the Rev. Hacksquad is the NSA Mission. Currently, there is only a placeholder file in the mainframe that you have to delete. So, yeah. Go take a look.
Oh, by the way, hit the abort contract button on your way to the hub. I was too lazy to make this thing complete itself.
-- Northern Epsilon
